name: K&C Stepping Stones
description: K&C Steppings provides community-based, in-home, and residential supports.

name: The Arc of the Ozarks
description: The Arc of the Ozarks provides community-based, in-home, and residential supports.

name: Self-Directed Supports
description: The Self-Directed Support (SDS) program is a means by which individuals and/or their designated representative can become an employer to employ those who might work with them best. These supports can occur in the community and in the home.
